trans-unit.source: Automatically generates single-table commands used to reconcile changes made to a <see cref="T:System.Data.DataSet" /> with the associated database.
trans-unit.target: Gera automaticamente os comandos de tabela única usados para reconciliar as alterações feitas em um <see cref="T:System.Data.DataSet" /> com o banco de dados associado.

trans-unit.source: This class cannot be inherited.
trans-unit.target: Essa classe não pode ser herdada.

trans-unit.source: This type is deprecated and will be removed in a future version of the .NET Framework.
trans-unit.target: Esse tipo foi substituído e será removido em uma versão futura do .NET Framework.

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Oracle and ADO.NET](~/docs/framework/data/adonet/oracle-and-adonet.md).
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações, consulte [Oracle e ADO.NET](~/docs/framework/data/adonet/oracle-and-adonet.md).

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleDataAdapter> does not automatically generate the SQL statements required to reconcile changes made to a <xref:System.Data.DataSet> associated with the database.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleDataAdapter> não gera automaticamente as instruções SQL necessárias para reconciliar as alterações feitas em um <xref:System.Data.DataSet> associado com o banco de dados.

trans-unit.source: However, you can create an <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleCommandBuilder> object that generates SQL statements for single-table updates by setting the <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleDataAdapter.SelectCommand%2A> property of the <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleDataAdapter>.
trans-unit.target: No entanto, você pode criar um <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleCommandBuilder> objeto que gera instruções SQL para atualizações de tabela única, definindo o <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleDataAdapter.SelectCommand%2A> propriedade o <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleDataAdapter>.

trans-unit.source: Then, the <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleCommandBuilder> generates any additional SQL statements that you do not set.
trans-unit.target: Em seguida, o <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleCommandBuilder> gera qualquer instrução SQL adicional que você não definir.

trans-unit.source: The relationship between an <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleDataAdapter> and its corresponding <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleCommandBuilder> is always one-to-one.
trans-unit.target: A relação entre um <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleDataAdapter> e correspondente <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleCommandBuilder> é sempre um para um.

trans-unit.source: To create this correspondence, you set the <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleDataAdapter> property of the <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleCommandBuilder> object.
trans-unit.target: Para criar essa correspondência, você deve definir o <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleDataAdapter> propriedade o <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleCommandBuilder> objeto.

trans-unit.source: This causes the <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleCommandBuilder> to register itself as a listener, which produces the output of <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleDataAdapter.RowUpdating> events that affect the <xref:System.Data.DataSet>.
trans-unit.target: Isso faz com que o <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleCommandBuilder> para se registrar como um ouvinte, que gera a saída de <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleDataAdapter.RowUpdating> eventos que afetam o <xref:System.Data.DataSet>.

trans-unit.source: To generate INSERT, UPDATE, or DELETE statements, the <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleCommandBuilder> uses the <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleDataAdapter.SelectCommand%2A> property to retrieve a required set of metadata.
trans-unit.target: Para gerar instruções INSERT, UPDATE ou DELETE, o <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleCommandBuilder> usa o <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleDataAdapter.SelectCommand%2A> propriedade para recuperar um conjunto necessário de metadados.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleCommandBuilder> also uses the <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleCommand.Connection%2A>, and <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleCommand.Transaction%2A> properties referenced by the <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleDataAdapter.SelectCommand%2A>.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleCommandBuilder> também usa o <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleCommand.Connection%2A>, e <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleCommand.Transaction%2A> propriedades referenciada pelo <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleDataAdapter.SelectCommand%2A>.

trans-unit.source: If you call <xref:System.Data.Common.DbDataAdapter.Dispose%2A>, the <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleCommandBuilder> is disassociated from the <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleDataAdapter>, and the generated commands are no longer used.
trans-unit.target: Se você chamar <xref:System.Data.Common.DbDataAdapter.Dispose%2A>, o <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleCommandBuilder> seja desassociado do <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleDataAdapter>, e os comandos gerados não são mais usados.

trans-unit.source: The following example uses <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleCommand>, along with <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleDataAdapter> and <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleConnection>, to select rows from a database.
trans-unit.target: O exemplo a seguir usa <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleCommand>, juntamente com <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleDataAdapter> e <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleConnection>, para selecionar linhas de um banco de dados.

trans-unit.source: The example is passed an initialized <xref:System.Data.DataSet>, a connection string, a query string that is an SQL SELECT statement, and a string that is the name of the database table.
trans-unit.target: O exemplo é passado uma inicializado <xref:System.Data.DataSet>, uma cadeia de caracteres de conexão, uma cadeia de caracteres de consulta que é uma instrução SQL SELECT e uma cadeia de caracteres que é o nome da tabela de banco de dados.

trans-unit.source: The example then creates an <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleCommandBuilder>.
trans-unit.target: O exemplo cria um <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleCommandBuilder>.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleCommandBuilder" />.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância do <see cref="T:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleCommandBuilder" />.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleCommandBuilder" />.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância do <see cref="T:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleCommandBuilder" />.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleCommandBuilder> registers itself as a listener for <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleDataAdapter.RowUpdating> events that are generated by the <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleDataAdapter> specified in this property.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleCommandBuilder> se registra como um ouvinte para <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleDataAdapter.RowUpdating> eventos gerados pelo <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleDataAdapter> especificado nesta propriedade.

trans-unit.source: When you create a new instance of <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleCommandBuilder>, any existing <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleCommandBuilder> associated with this <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleDataAdapter> is released.
trans-unit.target: Quando você cria uma nova instância da <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleCommandBuilder>, qualquer existente <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleCommandBuilder> associado a esta <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleDataAdapter> é liberado.

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleDataAdapter" /> object to associate with this <see cref="T:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleCommandBuilder" />.
trans-unit.target: Um objeto <see cref="T:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleDataAdapter" /> a associar a este <see cref="T:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleCommandBuilder" />.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleCommandBuilder" /> class with the associated <see cref="T:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleDataAdapter" /> object.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância da classe <see cref="T:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleCommandBuilder" /> com o objeto <see cref="T:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleDataAdapter" /> associado.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleCommandBuilder> registers itself as a listener for <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleDataAdapter.RowUpdating> events that are generated by the <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleDataAdapter> specified in this property.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleCommandBuilder> se registra como um ouvinte para <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleDataAdapter.RowUpdating> eventos gerados pelo <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleDataAdapter> especificado nesta propriedade.

trans-unit.source: When you create a new instance of <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleCommandBuilder>, any existing <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleCommandBuilder> associated with this <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleDataAdapter> is released.
trans-unit.target: Quando você cria uma nova instância da <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleCommandBuilder>, qualquer existente <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleCommandBuilder> associado a esta <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleDataAdapter> é liberado.

trans-unit.source: Sets or gets the <see cref="T:System.Data.Common.CatalogLocation" /> for an instance of the <see cref="T:System.Data.Common.DbCommandBuilder" /> class.
trans-unit.target: Define ou obtém o <see cref="T:System.Data.Common.CatalogLocation" /> para uma instância da classe <see cref="T:System.Data.Common.DbCommandBuilder" />.

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Data.Common.CatalogLocation" /> object.
trans-unit.target: Um objeto <see cref="T:System.Data.Common.CatalogLocation" />.

trans-unit.source: Sets or gets a string used as the catalog separator for an instance of the <see cref="T:System.Data.Common.DbCommandBuilder" /> class.
trans-unit.target: Define ou obtém uma cadeia de caracteres usada como o separador de catálogo para uma instância da classe <see cref="T:System.Data.Common.DbCommandBuilder" />.

trans-unit.source: A string indicating the catalog separator for use with an instance of the <see cref="T:System.Data.Common.DbCommandBuilder" /> class.
trans-unit.target: Uma cadeia de caracteres que indica o separador de catálogo para uso com uma instância do <see cref="T:System.Data.Common.DbCommandBuilder" /> classe.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets an <see cref="T:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleDataAdapter" /> object for which this <see cref="T:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleCommandBuilder" /> object will generate SQL statements.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define um objeto <see cref="T:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleDataAdapter" /> para o qual o objeto <see cref="T:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleCommandBuilder" /> gerará instruções SQL.

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleDataAdapter" /> object that is associated with this <see cref="T:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleCommandBuilder" />.
trans-unit.target: Um <see cref="T:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleDataAdapter" /> objeto que é associado a essa <see cref="T:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleCommandBuilder" />.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleCommandBuilder> registers itself as a listener for <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleDataAdapter.RowUpdating> events that are generated by the <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleDataAdapter> specified in this property.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleCommandBuilder> se registra como um ouvinte para <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleDataAdapter.RowUpdating> eventos gerados pelo <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleDataAdapter> especificado nesta propriedade.

trans-unit.source: When you create a new instance of <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleCommandBuilder>, any existing <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleCommandBuilder> associated with this <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleDataAdapter> is released.
trans-unit.target: Quando você cria uma nova instância da <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleCommandBuilder>, qualquer existente <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleCommandBuilder> associado a esta <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleDataAdapter> é liberado.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleCommand" /> referencing the stored procedure from which the parameter information is to be derived.
trans-unit.target: O <see cref="T:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleCommand" /> que referencia o procedimento armazenado do qual as informações de parâmetro devem ser derivadas.

trans-unit.source: The derived parameters are added to the <see cref="P:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleCommand.Parameters" /> collection of the <see cref="T:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleCommand" />.
trans-unit.target: Os parâmetros derivados são adicionados à coleção <see cref="P:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleCommand.Parameters" /> do <see cref="T:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleCommand" />.

trans-unit.source: Retrieves parameter information from the stored procedure specified in the <see cref="T:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleCommand" /> and populates the <see cref="P:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleCommand.Parameters" /> collection of the specified <see cref="T:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleCommand" /> object.
trans-unit.target: Recupera informações de parâmetro do procedimento armazenado especificado no <see cref="T:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleCommand" /> e popula a coleção <see cref="P:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleCommand.Parameters" /> do objeto <see cref="T:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleCommand" /> especificado.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleCommandBuilder.DeriveParameters%2A> overwrites any existing parameter information for the <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleCommand>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleCommandBuilder.DeriveParameters%2A> substitui quaisquer informações de parâmetro existentes para o <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleCommand>.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleCommandBuilder.DeriveParameters%2A> requires an extra call to the database to obtain the information.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleCommandBuilder.DeriveParameters%2A> requer uma chamada adicional para o banco de dados para obter as informações.

trans-unit.source: If the parameter information is known in advance, it is more efficient to populate the parameters collection by setting the information explicitly.
trans-unit.target: Se as informações de parâmetro são conhecidas antecipadamente, é mais eficiente para preencher a coleção de parâmetros definindo explicitamente as informações.

trans-unit.source: You can only use <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleCommandBuilder.DeriveParameters%2A> with stored procedures.
trans-unit.target: Você só pode usar <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleCommandBuilder.DeriveParameters%2A> com procedimentos armazenados.

trans-unit.source: You cannot use <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleCommandBuilder.DeriveParameters%2A> to populate the <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleParameterCollection> with arbitrary Transact-SQL statements, such as a parameterized SELECT statement.
trans-unit.target: Não é possível usar <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleCommandBuilder.DeriveParameters%2A> para preencher o <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleParameterCollection> com arbitrárias instruções Transact-SQL, como uma instrução SELECT com parâmetros.

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Configuring Parameters and Parameter Data Types](~/docs/framework/data/adonet/configuring-parameters-and-parameter-data-types.md).
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações, consulte [Configurando parâmetros e tipos de dados do parâmetro](~/docs/framework/data/adonet/configuring-parameters-and-parameter-data-types.md).

trans-unit.source: The command text is not a valid stored procedure name, or the <see cref="T:System.Data.CommandType" /> specified was not <see cref="F:System.Data.CommandType.StoredProcedure" />.
trans-unit.target: O texto do comando não é um nome válido de procedimento armazenado ou o <see cref="T:System.Data.CommandType" /> especificado não era <see cref="F:System.Data.CommandType.StoredProcedure" />.

trans-unit.source: Gets the automatically generated <see cref="T:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleCommand" /> object required to perform deletions on the database.
trans-unit.target: Obtém o objeto <see cref="T:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleCommand" /> gerado automaticamente necessário para executar exclusões no banco de dados.

trans-unit.source: You can use the <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleCommandBuilder.GetDeleteCommand%2A> method for informational or troubleshooting purposes because it returns the <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleCommand> object to be executed.
trans-unit.target: Você pode usar o <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleCommandBuilder.GetDeleteCommand%2A> fins de método de informação ou solução de problemas, porque retorna a <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleCommand> objeto a ser executado.

trans-unit.source: You can also use <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleCommandBuilder.GetDeleteCommand%2A> as the basis of a modified command.
trans-unit.target: Você também pode usar <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleCommandBuilder.GetDeleteCommand%2A> como a base de um comando modificado.

trans-unit.source: For example, you might call <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleCommandBuilder.GetDeleteCommand%2A> and modify the <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleCommand.CommandText%2A> value, and then explicitly set that on the <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleDataAdapter>.
trans-unit.target: Por exemplo, você pode chamar <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleCommandBuilder.GetDeleteCommand%2A> e modificar o <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleCommand.CommandText%2A> valor e, em seguida, definir explicitamente que o <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleDataAdapter>.

trans-unit.source: The SQL statements are first generated when the application calls either <xref:System.Data.Common.DbDataAdapter.Update%2A> or <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleCommandBuilder.GetDeleteCommand%2A>.
trans-unit.target: As instruções SQL são geradas pela primeira vez quando o aplicativo chama o <xref:System.Data.Common.DbDataAdapter.Update%2A> ou <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleCommandBuilder.GetDeleteCommand%2A>.

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Generating Commands with CommandBuilders](~/docs/framework/data/adonet/generating-commands-with-commandbuilders.md).
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações, consulte [gerar comandos com CommandBuilders](~/docs/framework/data/adonet/generating-commands-with-commandbuilders.md).

trans-unit.source: Gets the automatically generated <see cref="T:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleCommand" /> object required to perform deletions on the database.
trans-unit.target: Obtém o objeto <see cref="T:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleCommand" /> gerado automaticamente necessário para executar exclusões no banco de dados.

trans-unit.source: The automatically generated <see cref="T:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleCommand" /> object required to perform deletions.
trans-unit.target: O objeto <see cref="T:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleCommand" /> gerado automaticamente necessário para executar exclusões.

trans-unit.source: You can use the <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleCommandBuilder.GetDeleteCommand%2A> method for informational or troubleshooting purposes because it returns the <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleCommand> object to be executed.
trans-unit.target: Você pode usar o <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleCommandBuilder.GetDeleteCommand%2A> fins de método de informação ou solução de problemas, porque retorna a <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleCommand> objeto a ser executado.

trans-unit.source: You can also use <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleCommandBuilder.GetDeleteCommand%2A> as the basis of a modified command.
trans-unit.target: Você também pode usar <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleCommandBuilder.GetDeleteCommand%2A> como a base de um comando modificado.

trans-unit.source: For example, you might call <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleCommandBuilder.GetDeleteCommand%2A> and modify the <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleCommand.CommandText%2A> value, and then explicitly set that on the <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleDataAdapter>.
trans-unit.target: Por exemplo, você pode chamar <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleCommandBuilder.GetDeleteCommand%2A> e modificar o <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleCommand.CommandText%2A> valor e, em seguida, definir explicitamente que o <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleDataAdapter>.

trans-unit.source: The SQL statements are first generated when the application calls either <xref:System.Data.Common.DbDataAdapter.Update%2A> or <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleCommandBuilder.GetDeleteCommand%2A>.
trans-unit.target: As instruções SQL são geradas pela primeira vez quando o aplicativo chama o <xref:System.Data.Common.DbDataAdapter.Update%2A> ou <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleCommandBuilder.GetDeleteCommand%2A>.

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Generating Commands with CommandBuilders](~/docs/framework/data/adonet/generating-commands-with-commandbuilders.md).
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações, consulte [gerar comandos com CommandBuilders](~/docs/framework/data/adonet/generating-commands-with-commandbuilders.md).

trans-unit.source: If true, generate parameter names matching column names, if possible.
trans-unit.target: Se true, gerar nomes de parâmetro correspondentes a nomes de coluna, se possível.

trans-unit.source: If false, generate @p1, @p2, and so on.
trans-unit.target: Se false, gerar @p1, @p2 e assim por diante.

trans-unit.source: Gets the automatically generated <see cref="T:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleCommand" /> object required to perform deletions on the database.
trans-unit.target: Obtém o objeto <see cref="T:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleCommand" /> gerado automaticamente necessário para executar exclusões no banco de dados.

trans-unit.source: The automatically generated <see cref="T:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleCommand" /> object required to perform deletions.
trans-unit.target: O objeto <see cref="T:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleCommand" /> gerado automaticamente necessário para executar exclusões.

trans-unit.source: You can use the <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleCommandBuilder.GetDeleteCommand%2A> method for informational or troubleshooting purposes because it returns the <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleCommand> object to be executed.
trans-unit.target: Você pode usar o <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleCommandBuilder.GetDeleteCommand%2A> fins de método de informação ou solução de problemas, porque retorna a <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleCommand> objeto a ser executado.

trans-unit.source: You can also use <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleCommandBuilder.GetDeleteCommand%2A> as the basis of a modified command.
trans-unit.target: Você também pode usar <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleCommandBuilder.GetDeleteCommand%2A> como a base de um comando modificado.

trans-unit.source: For example, you might call <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleCommandBuilder.GetDeleteCommand%2A> and modify the <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleCommand.CommandText%2A> value, and then explicitly set that on the <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleDataAdapter>.
trans-unit.target: Por exemplo, você pode chamar <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleCommandBuilder.GetDeleteCommand%2A> e modificar o <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleCommand.CommandText%2A> valor e, em seguida, definir explicitamente que o <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleDataAdapter>.

trans-unit.source: The SQL statements are first generated when the application calls either <xref:System.Data.Common.DbDataAdapter.Update%2A> or <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleCommandBuilder.GetDeleteCommand%2A>.
trans-unit.target: As instruções SQL são geradas pela primeira vez quando o aplicativo chama o <xref:System.Data.Common.DbDataAdapter.Update%2A> ou <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleCommandBuilder.GetDeleteCommand%2A>.

trans-unit.source: The default behavior, when generating parameter names, is to use @p1, @p2, and so on for the various parameters.
trans-unit.target: O comportamento padrão, ao gerar nomes de parâmetro, é usar @p1, @p2, e assim por diante para os vários parâmetros.

trans-unit.source: Passing `true` for the `useColumnsForParameterNames` parameter allows you to force the <xref:System.Data.Common.DbCommandBuilder> to generate parameters based on the column names instead.
trans-unit.target: Passando `true` para o `useColumnsForParameterNames` parâmetro permite forçar o <xref:System.Data.Common.DbCommandBuilder> ao gerar parâmetros com base nos nomes de coluna em vez disso.

trans-unit.source: This succeeds only if the following conditions are met:
trans-unit.target: Isso é realizada somente se as seguintes condições forem atendidas:

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Data.Common.DbMetaDataColumnNames.ParameterNameMaxLength> has been specified and its length is equal to or greater than the generated parameter name.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Data.Common.DbMetaDataColumnNames.ParameterNameMaxLength> foi especificado e seu comprimento é igual ou maior que o nome de parâmetro gerado.

trans-unit.source: The generated parameter name meets the criteria specified in the <xref:System.Data.Common.DbMetaDataColumnNames.ParameterNamePattern> regular expression.
trans-unit.target: O nome de parâmetro gerado atende aos critérios especificados a <xref:System.Data.Common.DbMetaDataColumnNames.ParameterNamePattern> expressão regular.

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Data.Common.DbMetaDataColumnNames.ParameterMarkerFormat> is specified.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref:System.Data.Common.DbMetaDataColumnNames.ParameterMarkerFormat> for especificado.

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Generating Commands with CommandBuilders](~/docs/framework/data/adonet/generating-commands-with-commandbuilders.md).
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações, consulte [gerar comandos com CommandBuilders](~/docs/framework/data/adonet/generating-commands-with-commandbuilders.md).

trans-unit.source: Gets the automatically generated <see cref="T:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleCommand" /> object required to perform insertions on the database.
trans-unit.target: Obtém o objeto <see cref="T:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleCommand" /> gerado automaticamente necessário para executar inserções no banco de dados.

trans-unit.source: You can use the <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleCommandBuilder.GetInsertCommand%2A> method for informational or troubleshooting purposes because it returns the <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleCommand> object to be executed.
trans-unit.target: Você pode usar o <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleCommandBuilder.GetInsertCommand%2A> fins de método de informação ou solução de problemas, porque retorna a <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleCommand> objeto a ser executado.

trans-unit.source: You can also use <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleCommandBuilder.GetInsertCommand%2A> as the basis of a modified command.
trans-unit.target: Você também pode usar <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleCommandBuilder.GetInsertCommand%2A> como a base de um comando modificado.

trans-unit.source: For example, you might call <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleCommandBuilder.GetInsertCommand%2A> and modify the <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleCommand.CommandText%2A> value, and then explicitly set that on the <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleDataAdapter>.
trans-unit.target: Por exemplo, você pode chamar <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleCommandBuilder.GetInsertCommand%2A> e modificar o <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleCommand.CommandText%2A> valor e, em seguida, definir explicitamente que o <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleDataAdapter>.

trans-unit.source: The SQL statements are first generated when the application calls either <xref:System.Data.Common.DbDataAdapter.Update%2A> or <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleCommandBuilder.GetInsertCommand%2A>.
trans-unit.target: As instruções SQL são geradas pela primeira vez quando o aplicativo chama o <xref:System.Data.Common.DbDataAdapter.Update%2A> ou <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleCommandBuilder.GetInsertCommand%2A>.

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Generating Commands with CommandBuilders](~/docs/framework/data/adonet/generating-commands-with-commandbuilders.md).
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações, consulte [gerar comandos com CommandBuilders](~/docs/framework/data/adonet/generating-commands-with-commandbuilders.md).

trans-unit.target: Por exemplo, você pode chamar <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleCommandBuilder.GetInsertCommand%2A> e modificar o <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleCommand.CommandText%2A> valor e, em seguida, definir explicitamente que o <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleDataAdapter>.

trans-unit.source: The SQL statements are first generated when the application calls either <xref:System.Data.Common.DbDataAdapter.Update%2A> or <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleCommandBuilder.GetInsertCommand%2A>.
trans-unit.target: As instruções SQL são geradas pela primeira vez quando o aplicativo chama o <xref:System.Data.Common.DbDataAdapter.Update%2A> ou <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleCommandBuilder.GetInsertCommand%2A>.

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Generating Commands with CommandBuilders](~/docs/framework/data/adonet/generating-commands-with-commandbuilders.md).

trans-unit.source: If true, generate parameter names matching column names, if possible.
trans-unit.target: Se true, gerar nomes de parâmetro correspondentes a nomes de coluna, se possível.

trans-unit.source: If false, generate @p1, @p2, and so on.
trans-unit.target: Se false, gerar @p1, @p2 e assim por diante.

trans-unit.source: Gets the automatically generated <see cref="T:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleCommand" /> object required to perform insertions on the database.
trans-unit.target: Obtém o objeto <see cref="T:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleCommand" /> gerado automaticamente necessário para executar inserções no banco de dados.

trans-unit.source: The automatically generated <see cref="T:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleCommand" /> object required to perform insertions.
trans-unit.target: O objeto <see cref="T:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleCommand" /> gerado automaticamente necessário para executar inserções.

trans-unit.source: You can use the <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleCommandBuilder.GetInsertCommand%2A> method for informational or troubleshooting purposes because it returns the <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleCommand> object to be executed.
trans-unit.target: Você pode usar o <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleCommandBuilder.GetInsertCommand%2A> fins de método de informação ou solução de problemas, porque retorna a <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleCommand> objeto a ser executado.

trans-unit.source: You can also use <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleCommandBuilder.GetInsertCommand%2A> as the basis of a modified command.
trans-unit.target: Você também pode usar <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleCommandBuilder.GetInsertCommand%2A> como a base de um comando modificado.

trans-unit.source: For example, you might call <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleCommandBuilder.GetInsertCommand%2A> and modify the <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleCommand.CommandText%2A> value, and then explicitly set that on the <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleDataAdapter>.
trans-unit.target: Por exemplo, você pode chamar <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleCommandBuilder.GetInsertCommand%2A> e modificar o <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleCommand.CommandText%2A> valor e, em seguida, definir explicitamente que o <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleDataAdapter>.

trans-unit.source: The SQL statements are first generated when the application calls either <xref:System.Data.Common.DbDataAdapter.Update%2A> or <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleCommandBuilder.GetInsertCommand%2A>.
trans-unit.target: As instruções SQL são geradas pela primeira vez quando o aplicativo chama o <xref:System.Data.Common.DbDataAdapter.Update%2A> ou <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleCommandBuilder.GetInsertCommand%2A>.

trans-unit.source: The default behavior, when generating parameter names, is to use @p1, @p2, and so on for the various parameters.
trans-unit.target: O comportamento padrão, ao gerar nomes de parâmetro, é usar @p1, @p2, e assim por diante para os vários parâmetros.

trans-unit.source: Passing `true` for the `useColumnsForParameterNames` parameter allows you to force the <xref:System.Data.Common.DbCommandBuilder> to generate parameters based on the column names instead.
trans-unit.target: Passando `true` para o `useColumnsForParameterNames` parâmetro permite forçar o <xref:System.Data.Common.DbCommandBuilder> ao gerar parâmetros com base nos nomes de coluna em vez disso.

trans-unit.source: This succeeds only if the following conditions are met:
trans-unit.target: Isso é realizada somente se as seguintes condições forem atendidas:

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Data.Common.DbMetaDataColumnNames.ParameterNameMaxLength> has been specified and its length is equal to or greater than the generated parameter name.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Data.Common.DbMetaDataColumnNames.ParameterNameMaxLength> foi especificado e seu comprimento é igual ou maior que o nome de parâmetro gerado.

trans-unit.source: The generated parameter name meets the criteria specified in the <xref:System.Data.Common.DbMetaDataColumnNames.ParameterNamePattern> regular expression.
trans-unit.target: O nome de parâmetro gerado atende aos critérios especificados a <xref:System.Data.Common.DbMetaDataColumnNames.ParameterNamePattern> expressão regular.

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Data.Common.DbMetaDataColumnNames.ParameterMarkerFormat> is specified.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref:System.Data.Common.DbMetaDataColumnNames.ParameterMarkerFormat> for especificado.

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Generating Commands with CommandBuilders](~/docs/framework/data/adonet/generating-commands-with-commandbuilders.md).
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações, consulte [gerar comandos com CommandBuilders](~/docs/framework/data/adonet/generating-commands-with-commandbuilders.md).

trans-unit.source: Gets the automatically generated <see cref="T:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleCommand" /> object required to perform updates on the database.
trans-unit.target: Obtém o objeto <see cref="T:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleCommand" /> gerado automaticamente necessário para realizar atualizações no banco de dados.

trans-unit.source: You can use the <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleCommandBuilder.GetUpdateCommand%2A> method for informational or troubleshooting purposes because it returns the <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleCommand> object to be executed.

trans-unit.source: You can also use <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleCommandBuilder.GetUpdateCommand%2A> as the basis of a modified command.
trans-unit.target: Você também pode usar <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleCommandBuilder.GetUpdateCommand%2A> como a base de um comando modificado.

trans-unit.source: For example, you might call <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleCommandBuilder.GetUpdateCommand%2A> and modify the <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleCommand.CommandText%2A> value, and then explicitly set that on the <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleDataAdapter>.
trans-unit.target: Por exemplo, você pode chamar <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleCommandBuilder.GetUpdateCommand%2A> e modificar o <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleCommand.CommandText%2A> valor e, em seguida, definir explicitamente que o <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleDataAdapter>.

trans-unit.source: The SQL statements are first generated when the application calls either <xref:System.Data.Common.DbDataAdapter.Update%2A> or <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleCommandBuilder.GetUpdateCommand%2A>.
trans-unit.target: As instruções SQL são geradas pela primeira vez quando o aplicativo chama o <xref:System.Data.Common.DbDataAdapter.Update%2A> ou <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleCommandBuilder.GetUpdateCommand%2A>.

trans-unit.target: O comportamento padrão, ao gerar nomes de parâmetro, é usar @p1, @p2, e assim por diante para os vários parâmetros.

trans-unit.source: Passing `true` for the `useColumnsForParameterNames` parameter allows you to force the <xref:System.Data.Common.DbCommandBuilder> to generate parameters based on the column names instead.
trans-unit.target: Passando `true` para o `useColumnsForParameterNames` parâmetro permite forçar o <xref:System.Data.Common.DbCommandBuilder> ao gerar parâmetros com base nos nomes de coluna em vez disso.

trans-unit.source: This succeeds only if the following conditions are met:
trans-unit.target: Isso é realizada somente se as seguintes condições forem atendidas:

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Data.Common.DbMetaDataColumnNames.ParameterNameMaxLength> has been specified and its length is equal to or greater than the generated parameter name.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Data.Common.DbMetaDataColumnNames.ParameterNameMaxLength> foi especificado e seu comprimento é igual ou maior que o nome de parâmetro gerado.

trans-unit.target: O nome de parâmetro gerado atende aos critérios especificados a <xref:System.Data.Common.DbMetaDataColumnNames.ParameterNamePattern> expressão regular.

trans-unit.target: Um <xref:System.Data.Common.DbMetaDataColumnNames.ParameterMarkerFormat> for especificado.

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Generating Commands with CommandBuilders](~/docs/framework/data/adonet/generating-commands-with-commandbuilders.md).
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações, consulte [gerar comandos com CommandBuilders](~/docs/framework/data/adonet/generating-commands-with-commandbuilders.md).

trans-unit.source: The original unquoted identifier.
trans-unit.target: O identificador original sem aspas.

trans-unit.source: Given an unquoted identifier in the correct catalog case, returns the correct quoted form of that identifier, including properly escaping any embedded quotes in the identifier.
trans-unit.target: Dado um identificador sem aspas no caso de catálogo correto, retorna a forma entre aspas correta desse identificador, incluindo o escape apropriado de quaisquer aspas inseridas no identificador.

trans-unit.source: The quoted version of the identifier.
trans-unit.target: A versão entre aspas do identificador.

trans-unit.source: Embedded quotes within the identifier are properly escaped.
trans-unit.target: As aspas inseridas no identificador são escapadas adequadamente.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the character to be used for the separator between the schema identifier and any other identifiers.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define o caractere a ser usado para o separador entre o identificador do esquema e de quaisquer outros identificadores.

trans-unit.source: The character to be used as the schema separator.
trans-unit.target: O caractere a ser usado como separador de esquema.

trans-unit.source: Generally, database servers indicate the schema for a identifier by separating the schema name from the identifier with some character.
trans-unit.target: Geralmente, servidores de banco de dados indicam que o esquema para um identificador, separando o nome do esquema de identificador com alguns caracteres.

trans-unit.source: For example, SQL Server uses a colon, creating complete identifiers such as Person:CustomerName, where "Person" is the schema name and "CustomerName" is the identifier.
trans-unit.target: Por exemplo, o SQL Server usa um vírgula, criando identificadores completos como pessoa: CustomerName, onde "Pessoa" é o nome do esquema e "CustomerName" é o identificador.

trans-unit.source: Setting this property allows developers to modify this behavior.
trans-unit.target: Definir esta propriedade permite que desenvolvedores modificar esse comportamento.

trans-unit.source: The identifier that will have its embedded quotes removed.
trans-unit.target: O identificador que terá suas aspas inseridas removidas.

trans-unit.source: Given a quoted identifier, returns the correct unquoted form of that identifier, including properly un-escaping any embedded quotes in the identifier.
trans-unit.target: Dado um identificador entre aspas, retorna a forma sem aspas correta desse identificador, incluindo desfazer o escape adequado de quaisquer aspas inseridas no identificador.

trans-unit.source: The unquoted identifier, with embedded quotes properly un-escaped.
trans-unit.target: O identificador sem aspas, com aspas inseridas corretamente sem escape.
